*   no transparency
*   no scheduling tool for daily work

*   stability testing planning

*   MWB
*   SAP/QM (LIMS data)
*   successfactor

*   shift planning/Personaleinsatzplanung)

*   AI- enabled scheduling and capacity planning for QC (e.g. Binocs - bluecrux)
*   analyze (AI based) use of equipment to predict bottlenecks
